TopicTitle: Completion of the Tylo Monument Mission?

Articles.Content: I have been trying to complete the Tylo monument mission for a while now, and I finally successfully landed a probe within 3km of the monument, and even after collecting science and transmitting with full comm, I am unable to complete the mission? What am I missing here? I saw on another forum that probe cores would suffice for the mission? Does it have to be manned?
Returning here to say that I solved it, the probe core works, I just needed to land closer.
